**Protect yourself and others from COVID-19. Wash your hands frequently with soap and water, maintain a distance of 2 meters from others, do not touch clients during household visits, and stay home if you are sick and experiencing fever, cough, or shortness of breath.**
_Based on profile, you should follow them on:_

**Zitetezeni inu komanso anzanu ku matenda a Covid 19. Sambani mmanja kawirikawiri ndi madzi komanso sopo, Khalani motalikirana pafupifupi ma mita awiri, Musakhudzane ndi aliyense pamene mukugwira ntchiton yanu, ndipo mukhale kunyumba ngati mwatentha thupi, kutsokomola komanso kubanika kupuma.**
_Malingana ndi momwe mbiri ya iliri, mufufuzeni: ngati akumwa mankhwala mwandondomeko:_
Kodi akukumana ndi mavuto ena alionse kamba komwa mankhwala amatenda amgonagona?
Kufufuza zizindikiro zowopsa zodza kamba komwa mankhwala amatenda amgonagona
Kodi akukumana ndi mavuto ena alionse kamba kakumwa mankhwalawa?
Kodi anapatsidwa tsiku lotsatira lomwe akuyenera kupita ku chipatala?
Tsiku lina lotsatira lopita ku chipatala ndi liti?
Kupweteka kwa mutu, chizungulire kapenga nkhungu mmaso
Chongani chizindikiro china chiri chonse chomwe chiri chofunika
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale chizindikilo china chowopysa!
Kodi woyembekezera akuwona zizindikiro zowopsya izi
Ikani tsiku lomwe mzimai anapita padera
Kodi anapita kusikelo ya amai oyembekezera mwezi uno?
Anamupelekeza ndi ndani ku sikelo ya amai oyembekezera?
Tsimikizani tsiku loyembekezera kuchira lomwe liri mu buku la ku chipatala
Kodi adapatsidwa tsiku lomwe akuyembekezereka kudzachila kuchokera ku chipatala?
_Mulimbikitseni kuti apite ku sikelo kuti iye ndi mwana womuyembekezerayo akhale athanzi ndi kukonzekera kukachilira ku chipatala._
_Mayi sakudziwa za tsiku lodzachira, mukumbutseni mayiyo kuti akafunse za tsiku lomwe akuyembekezereka kudzachila kwa a namwino akapita kuchipatala ulendo otsatira_
Kodi mukufuna kusintha tsiku loyembekezera kuchira
Kodi ndi sikelo iti ya amai oyembekezera yomwe anapita?
Tsatanetsatane wa Sikelo ya Amai Oyembekezera
_Kumbutsani mayi zomulembetsa mwana mu pologalamu ya EID_.
Chonde lembani dzina/maina a ana amene ali moyo
Kubalalika kapena kukhala chikomokere kwa nthawi yaitali
Kulephera kusuntha zina mwa ziwalo zake atatsitsimuka
Kutupa kwa miyendo yonse komwe kukukulirakulirabe
Kukana kudya, kuyankhula ndi anthu, kapena kuchita zinthu mwa matsiku onse
Makhalidwe a ndeu kapena osautsa kwambiri
Kutupa, kufiira kapena kutuluka mafinya pa mchombo
Kupweteka kwa m'mimba ndi kukanika kuchita chimbuzi
Kutaya magazi mu njira ya abambo
Kubalalika kapena kukhala chikomokere kwa nthawi yaitali
Kupweteka kwa mutu kwa tsiku ndi tsiku
Kupweteka kwa mutu, chizungulire kapenga nkhungu mmaso
Akuwona zizindikilo zachilendo kamba kogwiritsa ntchito njira za kulera
Abambo akunyumba sakufuna kuti azigwiritsa ntchito njira zakulera
Kutsika kwa kuthamanga magazi zomwe zikumapangitsa chizungulire
Kuwona zinthu zomwe anthu ena sakuziwona

bind.calculate: if(../edd < today(), 'EDD cannot be in the past.', if(difference-in-months( /monthly_follow_up/lmp , ../edd) > 10, 'EDD should not be more than 10 months from LMP. Enter correct EDD.', 'EDD should not be more than 10 months from LMP. Enter correct EDD.'))

if(../new_edd < today(), 'EDD cannot be in the past.', if(difference-in-months( /monthly_follow_up/lmp , ../new_edd) > 10, 'EDD should not be more than 10 months from LMP. Enter correct EDD.', 'EDD should not be more than 10 months from LMP. Enter correct EDD.'))

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'bleeding') or selected(../danger_signs, 'swelling') or selected(../danger_signs, 'fever') or selected(../danger_signs, 'headache_dizziness') or selected(../danger_signs, 'lower_abdominal_pain') or selected(../danger_signs, 'convulsions') or selected(../danger_signs, 'water_bag_breaks'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'constipation') or selected(../danger_signs, 'nausea') or selected(../danger_signs, 'muscle_cramps') or selected(../danger_signs, 'haemorrhoids') and ../refer_and_accompany = 'no', 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../side_effects, 'shortness_of_breath') or selected(../side_effects, 'body_pains') or selected(../side_effects, 'swelling_sores_rash') or selected(../side_effects, 'body_pains') or selected(../side_effects, 'diarrhoea') or selected(../side_effects, 'severe_headache') or selected(../side_effects, 'vomiting') or selected(../side_effects, 'severe_abdominal_pain') or selected(../side_effects, 'jaundice'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'shortness_of_breath') or selected(../danger_signs, 'chest_pain') or selected(../danger_signs, 'irregular_heartbeat') or selected(../danger_signs, 'blurred_vision') or selected(../danger_signs, 'confusion_or_comatose') or selected(../danger_signs, 'stroke'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'severe_headache') or selected(../danger_signs, 'dizziness') or selected(../danger_signs, 'nosebleeds') or selected(../danger_signs, 'swelling_legs') and ../refer_and_accompany = 'no', 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'shortness_of_breath') or selected(../danger_signs, 'chest_pain') or selected(../danger_signs, 'blurred_vision') or selected(../danger_signs, 'confusion_or_comatose') or selected(../danger_signs, 'stroke'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'wheezing') or selected(../danger_signs, 'shortness_of_breath') or selected(../danger_signs, 'difficulty_speaking') or selected(../danger_signs, 'chest_pain'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'suicidal_thoughts') or selected(../danger_signs, 'hallucinations') or selected(../danger_signs, 'convlusions') or selected(../danger_signs, 'violent_or_aggressive_behaviour'), 'yes', 'no')
if(selected(../danger_signs, 'refusing_to_eat_or_talk') or selected(../danger_signs, 'insomnia') or selected(../danger_signs, 'overly_worried') and ../refer_and_accompany = 'no', 'yes', 'no')

if((not(selected(../pregnancy_follow_up/fields/danger_sign_screening/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../pregnancy_follow_up/fields/danger_sign_screening/danger_signs) >= 1) or (../anc_visits = '0' and selected(../pregnancy_follow_up/fields/visit_details/attended, 'no')) or (not(selected(../hiv_home_visit/fields/side_effect_screening/side_effects, 'none')) and count-selected(../hiv_home_visit/fields/side_effect_screening/side_effects) >= 1) or (not(selected(../hypertension/side_effect_screening/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../hypertension/side_effect_screening/danger_signs) >= 1) or (not(selected(../diabetes/side_effect_screening/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../diabetes/side_effect_screening/danger_signs) >= 1) or (not(selected(../asthma/side_effect_screening/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../asthma/side_effect_screening/danger_signs) >= 1) or (not(selected(../epilepsy/side_effect_screening/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../epilepsy/side_effect_screening/danger_signs) >= 1) or (not(selected(../mental_health/side_effect_screening/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../mental_health/side_effect_screening/danger_signs) >= 1) or selected(../other_ncd_fu/side_effect_screening/danger_signs, 'yes') or or selected(../heart_failure/side_effect_screening/danger_signs, 'yes') or (not(selected(../malnutrition_follow_up/side_effect_screening/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../malnutrition_follow_up/side_effect_screening/danger_signs) >= 1), 'yes', 'no')

bind.relevant: (../../pregnant = 'yes' or (../../is_in_fp = 'yes' and ../../fp_method != 'tubal_ligation') or ../../is_in_art = 'yes' or regex(../../ncds, 'Diabetes') or regex(../../ncds, 'Asthma') or regex(../../ncds, 'Epilepsy') or regex(../../ncds, 'MentalHealth') or (../../is_in_malnutrition = 'yes' and not(selected(../../malnutrition_follow_up/treatment_adherence/exit_malnutrition, 'yes'))))

(../../pregnant = 'yes' or (../../is_in_fp = 'yes' and ../../fp_method != 'tubal_ligation') or ../../is_in_art = 'yes' or regex(../../ncds, 'Diabetes') or regex(../../ncds, 'Asthma') or regex(../../ncds, 'Epilepsy') or regex(../../ncds, 'MentalHealth') or (../../is_in_malnutrition = 'yes' and not(selected(../../malnutrition_follow_up/treatment_adherence/exit_malnutrition, 'yes'))))
